meta_description: Welcome to Maine Mineral & Gem Museum in Bethel, Maine. Celebrate the mineralogy of Maine and enlighten visitors as to the origin of Earth
hours_text:
# Visit

**Your ticket to exploring Maine, the Moon, and so much more.** MMGM is just 1.5 hours from the bustling hub of Portland, and directly in the heart of the beautiful western Maine mountains.

__ Plan Your Visit to MMGM

### [ Tickets, Admission & Hours  Tickets may be purchased onsite at the admissions desk, or in advance online.  ](/web/20250913171038/https://mainemineralmuseum.org/visit/tickets-admission-hours/)

### [ Tours & Groups  **Experience MMGM together.** What better way to enjoy MMGM than with a group of friends or family?  ](/web/20250913171038/https://mainemineralmuseum.org/visit/tours-groups/)

### [ Getting Here  MMGM is 1.5 hours from Portland, 1 hour from North Conway, 3.5 hours from Boston, and 4 hours from Montreal.  ](/web/20250913171038/https://mainemineralmuseum.org/visit/getting-here/)

### [ Museum Map  Download this map before your visit, or pick up a copy at the admissions desk.  ](/web/20250913171038/https://mainemineralmuseum.org/visit/museum-map/)

## Upcoming Events

[ __ What's Happening Next ](/web/20250913171038/https://mainemineralmuseum.org/events/)

collections_text:
###### WELCOME TO THE

# Maine Mineral  
& Gem Museum

##### **Visit MMGM today.** Open every day except Tuesday.

[ Plan Your Visit ](/web/20260115072431/https://mainemineralmuseum.org/visit)

## [Groundbreaking research happens here.](/web/20260115072431/https://mainemineralmuseum.org/research/)

[ __ Explore More ](/web/20260115072431/https://mainemineralmuseum.org/research)

## [ The MStore  The MStore makes gift giving easy with a carefully curated selection of activity kits and toys, books for every age, MMGM merchandise, and more.  ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260115072431/https://store.mainemineralmuseum.org/)

## [ Jewelry  Specializing in jewelry made with colorful Maine mined gemstones from everyday casual to custom one-of-a-kind pieces.  ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260115072431/https://mmgm-jewelry.com/)

## [ Upcoming Events  Featuring speakers, family activities, presentations, mineral ID days, and more, there's always something exciting coming up at MMGM.  ](/web/20260115072431/https://mainemineralmuseum.org/events/)
